name: Afterlife (itch) (UOWM Game Development)
description:
Afterlife is a 2D Top down action game with roguelike dungeon crawler elements about a man trying to escape from a hell train.

A former soldier wakes up on a train to hell. After obtaining a power that lets him respawn and get stronger with each death from a friendly skeleton, he decides to escape in an attempt to reunite with his family.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

GPS 1 Team 2 - STS (Struggling To Survive)
